description: "The Screams Reserved For Murder". Our story continues as Detective Drekker looks to relive one of his first cases... A stretch of cookie-cutter suburbia sits against a curtain of smoke stacks, factories and an expansive cemetery. Despite the bleak backdrop, Edmund and his friends live and play unencumbered. The group of children are every bit a family. But the family is threatened when one of theirs is killed, then another. A single child’s death can unite a community, but a few can destroy the community’s spirit. The children band together for support and protection against this ‘Boogeyman Killer.’ But a question hangs in the air above the town; has the Boy Zero brought the Boogeyman with him? Boy Zero is an epic noir spanning decades and two separate murder mysteries. The cases are somehow connected and Detective Drekker must connect them before the killings begin again.
name: The Screams Reserved For Murder

description:
03: Natural Selection

Porter's childhood continues with a glimpse of his schoolmates: some are lifelong friends. Some are passing faces in a sea of bodies. Others are wolves in sheep's clothing, awaiting a time to exploit the innocence around themselves.

"A word of advice: don't fuck with peanuts."

Patterns form. Wheels are set in motion. Regrets swell like a dam poised to break, yet inevitably his eyes are blind...ignorant...trusting.
name: Natural Selection

description:
The Queens Of Ruin

The conclusion to the second siege of Arlam, the explanation of how Cass and Mikki put aside their differences, and the foundations of a brand new City War title all in the one issue!

part 6 of 6
name: The Queens of Ruin

description: This eighth and final issue of the first series of COLLIDERS tracks Adva as he makes a fateful decision that will set the world spinning.

...MY GOD...MY DUCK...or The Cray, the Bad, and the Angry Stick!

The Cray Baby Adventures #5

The search for the Cray Stick of Joy continues! Who are the mysterious Peddidlers? What do they want with Cray? Beware of false sticks that may be in disguise of the true stick you seek. PLUS! Captain Camel and Craynobi discover the Land of YAHGZ! Beware the Gelatinious Forms...and creatures lurking in the brush. ACTION and ADVENTURE AWAITS! Presented digitally for the first time! Created by Art Baltazar. Originally published by Art Baltazar's ELECTRIC MILK COMICS in 1995!

A Killer on the Loose

Things heat up when a notorious killer arrives in Lynchburg. The stranger's past comes back to haunt him as he teams up with war torn soliders. Bonus feature: ZOMBIES!
name: A Killer On the Loose

description: In a divine intervention Mexico's national treasure , the superhero El Grito makes his long awaited appearance. Representing the Mexican federal government will his appearance do more harm than good?

volume.name: El Peso Hero: La Cueva de las Espadas

description:
76 pages of Mutant Mayhem!

The X-Men and the Guardians of the Galaxy join forces to save Jean Grey! More star-spanning adventure from Brian Michael Bendis, Sara Pichelli and Stuart Immonen!

Featuring material first printed in Guardians of the Galaxy #12, All-New X-Men #24 and Uncanny X-Men #17-18.

Bending the Rules

This month's comic is crammed with great stuff! First, we wrap up the storyline that revolved around Lightning Lady's mother's visit. From that, we spend a little time as Keagan and Elastic Man consider their budding... friendship? And from there, we careen headlong into a brand new adventure that will find Elastic Man (and some other Evil Inc favorites) in an intergalactic struggle of epic proportions!

And for the Bonus Feature - oh, man! As a way to celebrate the digital release of the 416-page book, The Complete Greystone Inn, I'm grabbing all of the Greystone Inn strips that featured the gang attending Comic Con International! It's over thirty pages of awesome bonus content! If you've never read G.I. before, I think you're going to get a kick out of it!
name: Bending the Rules

description:
All That's Said and Done

Justice may be blind but can she be trusted? Furphy narrowly escapes trouble and discovers a concealed truth about Agents. The entity rescued from Agents forges an intrinsic connection with Mim. D prepares to solve technological issues with violence. Allie finds herself incarcerated but cannot recall how she came to be there. Lance Marko offers reassuring answers.

Falling Star is an original ongoing comic series created, written and drawn by Crisitan Roux. Focusing on a number of super-powered characters each trying to reconcile the nature of their gift, or curse, and their place in the world confronting them. Currently, a twice yearly publication with an emphasis on producing a high quality comic both in story and art. Each issue features a full colour wrap-around cover and contains 24-28 internal pages of grayscale art.
name: All That's Said and Done

description: After the disappointment of her changing ceremony, Frankie is trying her best to stay optimistic. Luckily the junior heroes and villains games are coming up... will this distraction be enough for Frankie, or will it only complicate things?

In this issue, our first color issue, we have 3 great stories. First up is "Toombora" by Lloyd Smith Jr, Phillip Fried and comic book legend Dick Ayers. Next is "The Black Rose" once again by Lloyd Smith Jr and David Vance. And lastly, "Brother Bones: Needle Justice" by Ron Fortier and Joe Arnold. Cover by Steve Busti and Dick Ayers.

The second massive volume of GREEN LANTERN tales written by best-selling writer Geoff Johns is here, collecting GREEN LANTERN #26-52, BLACKEST NIGHT #0-7, DC UNIVERSE #0, UNTOLD TALES OF BLACKEST NIGHT #1-2 and BLACKEST NIGHT: TALES OF THE CORPS #1-2. In these stories, Hal Jordan and his comrades must face the threat of the Alpha Lanterns, the rage of the Red Lanterns, the rise of the Black Lanterns, and much more!
name: Volume 2

volume.name: Green Lantern By Geoff Johns Omnibus

description:
Proper Japanese Title: 才能とセンス (Sainō To Sensu)

Chapter Titles

  • Chapter 145: Limit Switch 2 (極限スイッチ2 Kyokugen Suitchi 2)
  • Chapter 146: Talent and Sense (才能とセンス Sainō To Sensu)
  • Chapter 147: Direct Confrontation (真っ向勝負 Makkō Shōbu)
  • Chapter 148: Declaration of War (宣戦布告 Sensen Fukoku)
  • Chapter 149: A Chemical Reaction of Encounters (出会いの化学変化 Deai No Kagaku Henka)
  • Chapter 150: A Greeting Gift (ごあいさつ Go Aisatsu)
  • Chapter 151: Final Novices (決勝初心者 Kesshō Shoshinsha)
  • Chapter 152: The 'Lefty' Menace (“左”の脅威 "Hidari” No Kyōi)
  • Chapter 153: Receive No. 3 (３本目 3-Pon-Me)
  • Special: The Fight Is Not Over (戦いは終わらない Tatakai wa owaranai)
name: Talent and Sense

description: Special Agent Bob struggles with mind control issues as he is prepared to head to Cuba on his covert CIA mission. The mad scientist, Dr. Gottlieb, recounts the multiple attempts to kill Fidel Castro. Is he the luckiest man alive or just the recipient of bungled assassination attempts by the CIA.

The 3300 year old mummy Aten Ra, now living in LA as Adam Ray, continues his story of reuniting with the reincarnation of his lost love, Ankesenamun, now reborn as Ming Yue. And in this lifetime her father is the Chinese Doctor, the most notorious terrorist of the twentieth century, and an old acquaintance of Adam. Terror, treachery and twisted romance...with some laughs thrown in for good measure.
The Mecheer army is here! Aria crumbles while Maria and Darius fight for their lives, but without Redwing, all will be lost. Will Jackson, Arad, or Cory be able to help turn the tide of the battle?

76 pages of Marvel Universe adventure!

Daredevil has walked into a trap set by the Shroud – but whoever wins, the sinister Owl may be the ultimate victor! By Mark Waid and Chris Samnee!

The Silver Surfer confronts the Never Queen as Dawn Greenwood leads a prison breakout! Cosmic adventure from Dan Slott and Michael Allred!

An 'Original Sin' chapter! A mystery that spans the history of the Marvel Universe is finally revealed: discover the secret life of Nick Fury! By Jason Aaron and Mike Deodato!

Featuring material first printed in Daredevil #3, SIlver Surfer #2-3 and Original Sin #5.

Into My Heart

My Life in Records is a comic book series that tells the story of three brothers who are obsessed with music. Into My Heart is the second issue of the series and begins with Tom’s brush with death in a swimming pool. This experience combined with a kiddie gospel record gets Tom asking lots of questions.

For instance:

What is the difference between the Holy Ghost and Scary Ghosts?

And:

Does Jesus stick out of people if He comes to live inside the heart of a person who is shorter than Him?
name: Into My Heart

description:
Collects Myths of India: Vishnu, Myths of India: Yama, Myths of India: Garuda, Myths of India: Kartikkeya, and Myths of India: Parashuram:

Witness the gruesome demise of a demon lord that bred pure hatred for the world. Follow in the footsteps of Yama, Lord of Death, as he takes you to the netherworld. Fly in the wake of Garuda, the mighty avian warrior. Marvel at the travails that marked the birth of Kartikkeya, the God of Eternal Youth. Be awestruck by the thunder and energy of Parashuram as he brings down kingdoms with his axe. These are tales that marked the beginning of time and are being retold today from an entirely new perspective, and in all likeliness, will still be told a thousand years hence. Graphic India and Deepak Chopra present a second compilation of the groundbreaking new series, MYTHS OF INDIA. Collecting five immortal tales from Indian mythology in over 140 pages of stunning artwork along with a mesmerizing sketchbook section, each tale features a foreword by acclaimed author Deepak Chopra.

Collects Myths of India: Vishnu, Myths of India: Yama, Myths of India: Garuda, Myths of India: Kartikkeya, and Myths of India: Parashuram.
name: Volume 2

description:
The Big Idea

In this issue Beryl, Stan, Stella, Esme and Eugene band together to create a whole new season of New Stuff comics!
name: The Big Idea

description: Trapped in her dreams, Abigail finds that this strange world is far more dangerous and complex than she could have ever imagined.

Chapter Titles

  • 40th Punch: The Man Who Wants To Be A Monster
  • 41st Punch: Blizzard Group
  • 42nd Punch: Don't Look Down On It!
  • 43rd Punch: Accelerate
  • 44th Punch: Hero Name
  • Volume 9 Extra 1
  • Volume 9 Extra 2
name: Vol. 9

description: Since 1988, PREVIEWS has been your ultimate source for all of the comics and merchandise to be available from your local comic book shop... revealed up to two months in advance! Hundreds of comics and graphic novels from the best comic publishers; the coolest pop-culture merchandise on Earth; plus PREVIEWS exclusive items available nowhere else! Now more than ever, PREVIEWS is here to show the tales, toys and treasures in your future! This July issue features items scheduled to ship in October 2015 and beyond.

Extraordinary

Psypher was a superhero who died five years ago at the hands of the Living Nightmare. Now, somebody else has taken up the mantle...
name: Extraordinary

description:
Girls Just Wanna Have Fun

Cassie brings along a friend, Sally, to join the boys' game. Little does she know, Sally and Elliot don't exactly see eye to eye and their conflict threatens to break up the newly formed group.
name: Girls Just Wanna Have Fun

description: Lawrence, leaving his mortal body behind, is stunned to meet his father in the afterlife who has come in order to help him transition. Clinging to the desperate hope of finding his son, Lawrence rejects his father’s offer. Instead, he chooses to become an outsider, living in the ‘seam,’ the middle ground between Heaven and Earth, so that he can both find his son and seek revenge upon the dealer that gave his son the fatal drugs.

Chapter Titles

  • Chapter 67: Orvud District, Outer Wall (オルブド区外壁, Orubudo-ku Gaiheki)
  • Chapter 68: Ruler of the Walls (壁の王, Kabe no Ō)
  • Chapter 69: Friends (友人, Yūjin)
  • Chapter 70: A Dream From the Past (いつか見た夢, Itsuka Mita Yume)
name: Vol. 17

volume.name: Shingeki no Kyojin: Before the Fall

description: Annie seeks counseling from the Vicar Melmoth and this is conducted in the customary way for Modern Orthodox Satanists—during intercourse. Melmoth counsels Annie to find some space for herself as well as her family. As Cain and Mary join the school’s jazz ensemble, Lilith and Julius go on a date. And Ralf receives an unexpected phonecall from ex-coworker Vicky, but he shrugs her off, he is on a mission to enroll for unemployment benefits.

This ain't no honeymoon!

In the second fun-filled issue of SOD, we find Melanie making the best of her new digs in Sod City, but no matter how hard she tries, this voluptuous city girl sticks out like a sore thumb . . . much to the delight of all the male residents. Meanwhile, JB is busy rallying the troops in an attempt to inject life back into the dying town. Task number one: calling in the guys in the white lab coats to uncover the cause of the creeping virus that has been plaguing Sod City and killing all the vegetation. They mix up a remedy and everything is s-l-o-w-l-y going according to plan, until the impatient and greedy JB tries to speed up the scientific process and, in turn, sets off a chain reaction that grows into an uncontrollable horror overnight -- literally! Yep . . . the grass grows green, but it's hungry . . . and it's craving human meat.

Who will be

SOD's first victims?

 Dig into to Sod #2

today and find out!

Decoherence

The Council send their special agents to the Twin Cities to deal with the Blood Witch situation. Suspicious of Xigi's involvement in the destruction of Axis Mundi, they decided it is best to end Ariel's apprenticeship with him.
name: Decoherence

description: Sarah is taken hostage by a Surranian warlord. John struggles to find a way to save her, while Monson attempts to undermine his authority. The truth about Mark's mother is revealed.

Sarah Saber has become enwrapped in her father's plots. Dr. Richard Saber, a physicist specializing in the research of dark matter and dark energies, inadvertently caused his daughter to be exposed to dark matter. Now forced to go into hiding, Sarah and Richard lay low in the deserts of Sante Fe, New Mexico...

Into the Deep End

Prunella Jones continues to desperately assemble a new team to staff the Time Corps Venice Beach sub-station. After a hurried training period, the new team members are thrown into their tough first case!
name: Into the Deep End

description:
Ronan continues his investigation into the death of his girlfriend, runs into an assassin sent to literally take his head off and takes yet another trip to the emergency room.

Oh...and there's a reluctant date with redhead #2 that leads to something...you'll just have to read it to find out!
name: Part 3

description:
After the dramatic events of issue two, a huge shift in geopolitics has allowed Alexandrov, a super powered ultra-nationalist to take control of Russia.

He now has a vast arsenal of nuclear weapons at his command and unless he is stopped, will unleash Armageddon at the press of a button.

Who, or what, can stop this megalomaniacal mad man?
A centuries-old sorceror and his hellish kin use the ghosts of slaughtered children to protect their precious library... But tragedy awaits and the house of Erebus will fall...
name: The House of Erebus

description:
Contents

  • My Hero Academia Ch. 52 (Todoroki, Tenya, Stain and Izuku are the only characters to appear in the chapter proper, most of the other main cast appear on the opening page of the chapter, the magazine cover and/or the color spread chapter cover in honor of the series' first anniversary)
  • Assassination Classroom Ch. 149
  • Straighten Up! Welcome to Shika High's Competitive Dance Club Ch. 12
  • Deadman Killer
  • Saiki Kusuo no Psi-nan Ch. 157
  • Black Clover Ch. 23
  • Hinomaru Zumō Ch. 58
  • Food Wars: Shokugeki no Soma Ch. 128
  • Haikyū!! Ch. 167
  • Gintama Ch. 551
  • Best Blue Ch. 3
  • Nisekoi Ch. 179
  • Toriko Ch. 332
  • World Trigger Ch. 110
  • Kagamigami Ch. 24
  • Kochikame Ch. 1898
  • Lady Justice Ch. 11
  • Bleach Ch. 636
  • Devily Man Ch. 10
  • Isobe Isobee Monogatari: Ukiyo wa Tsurai yo Ch. 149
name: No. 35 August 10, 2015

description: MONSTER VERSUS MACHINE! THE BLACK BAT STRIKES! THE STARCROSSER GETS AMBUSHED AND AN INMATE RELIVES THE WORST DAY OF HIS LIFE.
name: Vol. 4

description:
The Fateful Decision

Years ago, the race to colonize Mars cost the life of a man protecting his son. That boy would become the trusted diplomat Ambassador Benton Hawkes - who has never forgotten his father's sacrifice ­and never let go his hatred of Mars. One of the last honest men, he has made powerful enemies - who have sent him to start a war between two nations. It would be best for him if he did. But an honest man rarely does what's best for himself.
name: The Fateful Decision

description: UNIVERSE! #3 is finally here and with it, the long awaited answer to one of mankind's greatest questions: "What do we know about Taurus-77?"... Okay, so maybe that's not exactly nagging most of us but we can assure you the answer's much more entertaining! Find out in this newest story of the series from what we're starting to believe can only be the alien mind of Albert Monteys!
name: What We Know About Taurus-77

person_credits.name: Rumiko Takahashi
person_credits.role: writer, penciler, letterer, inker, colorist, cover

description:
Fale, bounty hunter and 'Jane of All Trades' has been hired to do a job; find Del, survive the American wasteland and bring her home, by whatever means necessary.

This is part 1/3 of the epic post-apocalyptic tale, ALMIGHTY.
name: Vol. 1

description:
Space Lion, Part 1

The deposed queen of Arriopa is on trial for her life. Her only hope? A stranded, desperate Andrew Jackson. Can his frontier lawyerin' and fisticuffs save the day?
name: Space Lion, Part 1

description: Swimming's a lot of fun, but if you're not careful, you could end up in big trouble! That's where Betty and Veronica come in -- they're Riverdale's best lifeguards and they're ready for action in this digital-only collection! Between the pool and the beach, they'll have their hands full. Can they save everyone in time?
name: Sea Escape; Kidding Around; Sight Unseen

description:
The inaugural issue of an ongoing mini-comics series, a one-man anthology of odd comics by Jamie Tanner.

This first issue contains two short stories - "The Advance" and "Lucky Boy" - as well as selections from "Always On Brand", a series of experiments in nonsensical marketing-speak poetry.

From the pages of the Eisner and Harvey Award-winning Dark Horse Presents…

By the writer of the Eisner-nominated High Crimes...

Christopher Sebela (Dead Letters, High Crimes) and Brian Churilla (Hellbreak) craft a horror tale of outbreak and infection set on a remote pacific island during World War II. Three US soldiers tasked with spotting Japanese bombers run afoul of a mysterious balloon and all hell breaks loose on their small island home as it erupts in madness.

Contains the entirety of Cruel Biology from Dark Horse Presents Vol. 2 #33-#36.

Chapter 1

Description

"My father, my hero, he promised he'd never leave me but the Kingdom, War, took him away from me and now I only have the echo his memory."

Once upon a time... There was a mighty warrior. A hero of millions and General of the great army of the Kingdom of Irinoi. With the aid of his hammer, Makinui, he defended the Kingdom, it's people and his son.

But one day tragedy struck, a hero fell and the legend was tarnished.

Years passed and now, Jonah, the general's son is on a quest to seek justice with the aid of his friends and his guardian, a big warrior-ape that only he can summon. Together they embark on the adventure of a lifetime to clear Jonah's father legacy.
name: Chapter 1

description:
Blown away by their first bout, four young women decide to take on the world. With skates on their feet, helmets on their heads, pads on their knees and fire in their hearts they assemble a mighty roller derby league. Follow their exploits on and off the track as they skate fast, turn left and hit hard. It’s red-hot girl-on-girl sports action!

Freaktown Comics brings the excitement and action of roller derby to the comics page, and introduces you to the people who make it happen.

volume.name: Fast and Frightening - A Comic About Roller Derby

description: Politicians are both born and made. As one of the most powerful women in politics, Hillary Clinton has served as an inspiration and lightning rod. Often controversial, she has carved an unmatched legacy into a traditionally male occupation. This volume collects Female Force: Hillary Clinton, Hillary Clinton: Secretary of State, and Political Power: Hillary Clinton.
name: TPB

description:
Collects Fist of Justice Vol. 2 #2-3, 3.5 exclusive to this collection, and 4-6:

Join us as we continue FoJ's journey towards reclaiming his life and finding his place in this new world. Of course, nothing's ever easy; As if the repeated appearance of the enigmatic Professor Mistyk, who keeps sending him to alternate timelines for reasons that have not been made fully clear to him yet, wasn't enough, Marc is going to have to deal with old foes, monsters made of molten rock, mole men, a race-car driving talking dog, zombies and... Fist of Justice Lad?!?
name: Volume 2

description: The sequel to sold out comic book and classic film series inspired by Ray Harryahusen. Jason has the mythological Golden Fleece firmly in his grasp. Now learn what happens as the Argonauts sail home and bleakly discover that they have been manipulated in the plans of Zeus who prepares for a celestial war that will break Olympus apart!
name: TPB

volume.name: Jason and the Argonauts: Final Chorus

description:
Three Titanic Tales

MMORPG comes to life, a second rate Villain, or Mermonkeys... Johnny deals with all these things and more!
name: Three Titanic Tales

description: After losing both her parents in a terrible car accident, Zoey is suddenly slated to inherit Greek billionaire Theo Kannelis's fortune. Swamped by the press, she is unable to even leave her own house. In the midst of the media circus, she is visited by Theo's protégé, a businessman named Anton. Having gained a reputation as a playboy through his numerous flings with beautiful women, he appears to be next in line to inherit the elderly Theo's international corporation. He tells Zoey, "I'll take you away to someplace safe, where they can't find you," but it must be a trap! Several hours later, after being misled by Anton, she finds herself being spirited away to Greece!
name: Vol. 1

description: A team of priests discovers that sin is a slope as they battle to save their parish by any means necessary. A graphic novel in the style of Breaking Bad. Series of five issues!
name: GN

description:
Kio's an ordinary high school student living in Okinawa. One day, he meets a cat-eared alien named Eris who claims to have come to Earth for an investigation. For whatever reason, Eris has decided to live with Kio and not only is she a freeloader, she seems to have brought a lot of troubles along as well? after much anticipation, this popular love comedy has finally been adapted into a manga!

Chapter Titles

  • Chapter 001: Who Are You?
  • Chapter 002: A Cat-Eared Freeloader
  • Chapter 003: "Company Girls"
  • Chapter 004: The Barbecue Was Delicious!
  • Chapter 005: A Cat Who Appeared Out of the Soil
  • Chapter 006: Bad-Luck Momiji
name: Vol. 1

description: Each issue of Marvel Previews is a comic book-sized, 120-page, full-color guide and preview to all of Marvel's upcoming releases - it's your #1 source for advanced information on Marvel Comics! This August issue features items scheduled to ship in October 2015 and beyond.

After trying to save her best friend from a loveless marriage, Jane Sherwood has been constantly harassed by the upset groom, Ryan Blair. From bankrupting her to having her kicked out from her apartment, Ryan has been getting his revenge for the past three years. One night, Jane decides she needs some revenge of her own and punches Ryan so hard it leaves her hand injured. To make up for such a humiliating spectacle, Ryan attempts to make Jane his mistress and takes care of her while she heals. Just how much more suffering will Ryan put her through? Is he really trying to get revenge or is there something else behind his actions?
name: Vol. 1

description: This book contains four unique stories. The Container is a science fiction story. The Missing Relic is a mystery story set in the 1920s. The Ancient Men of Easter Island is told in a style of a legend. Wings and Screams is a horror/suspense story.

Helium

Simple and elegant, there's something almost perfect about a Helium atom.

The same can't be said for the rest of the world. Jemma and Trak are stuck on opposite sides of a planet dead set on destroying itself. And while they've kept their relationship safe from the chaos around them living inside a virtual world Trak created, even that can't stay forever. So perhaps it's worth giving up the life they have to try and find something as real and perfect as an atom of Helium.

Assuming they can survive.
name: Helium

description: A personal narrative exploring friendship, adventure, and loss.

Based in the Pentagon is a nameless clandestine special ops squad composed of members with special abilities. This squad is tasked with dangerous internal investigations and off the records wet-work.

THE PENTAGON #1

A special squad of military operatives is tasked with bringing in a rogue general and putting an end to his horrific animal experiments.

This story follows afer the events of "Cy-Boar #3: The Enforcer"

Finally overcoming the hurt she experienced from her previous marriage, Emma is now a successful interior designer. However, she suddenly comes under suspicion from Zack, the older brother of her friend who introduced her to the job. "Did you get that job by sleeping with my little brother?" He knows that Emma's previous husband was a famous musician who died from a drug overdose, and he fears that his brother is her next target. "I won't be fooled... Under that frightened disguise of yours lies a wicked monster!" says Zack in an angry tone as he approaches Emma...
name: Vol. 1

description: Hebe secretly admires, Nick, her boss at the art gallery where she works in London. She spends a passionate night with him, but her happiness ends the next morning. Nick throws her away, saying, "I would never have expected you were a mistress of Andrew Southern!" Nick shows the stunned Hebe a painting by a legendary artist, Andrew Southern--a portrait of a woman with watery eyes and a smile lying on a bed. The woman is a spitting image of Hebe! Nick does not try to hide his disgust at seeing her in the painting and accuses her of being after his money. But Hebe has never met the painter and she is truly in love with Nick, even though he doesn't believe it....
name: Vol. 1

description: A noir that explores the methodic and structured life of a novelist, and the disturbing effects that long-term isolation has on his routine.

Rock n Roll!

Originally published in the 80s by Look Mom, Comics!, Pure Entertainment brought together some of the best cartooning talent in alternative comics from the New York area (and beyond!) to celebrate, denigrate and generally disseminate Rock Music. Many of the artists in Pure Entertainment went on to bigger and better things and this book provides a great "then and now" perspective on these great cartoonists.

Pure Entertainment is a 72 page, B&W 5" x 7.5" pocket book edited by Pete Friedrich and featuring pieces by Bob Camp, Peter Kuper, Mort Todd, J.B. Bonivert, Dave Simons, Gary Hallgren, Gene Fama, Michael Fontanelli, Eric Cartier, Voss, and much more! The book includes a huge range illustrated of bands and songs - from early Roxy Music to New York Dolls to Devo to Geza X and everything inbetween, plus lots of original storylines!
name: Rock n Roll!

description: In 2015 AD, the UN approved of a worldwide activation of a machine that would generate unlimited, clean energy that would be distributed to everyone via airwaves. A few people opposed this and some even moved underground. They only became right when there was a miscalculation: Once the machine was turned on, everybody's brain got "fried" and almost all human and animal life died. Those underground who were smart enough to install the proper "shielding" in their habitats survived. They had to stay underground and outlast the Energy Generator. They finally got out after 52 years when the machine finally stopped functioning due to lack of maintenance. A new form of government was formed around "Lawbringers", "Relic Tecs", "Gatherers", "Traders" and "Hunters".

A 60+ page anthology of formative comic works from SAUCE! Stories included in the collection are, Falling Star, Office Zombie - White Noise, John Christie Detective, It's a Bit Like Chicken and Office Zombie - Mumbled Beginnings.

In the not too distant Dystopian future, Houston Texas has become the most crime ridden cesspool of destruction and chaos In America. With a severe lack of funding and manpower down to a fraction of it's original numbers, the Houston Police Department has no choice but to downsize all remaining precincts and combine them into one central unit focused on patrolling the entire city. This minuscule task force of highly trained individuals is ready to bring the city back to justice, but at what cost? One man will learn the true meaning of what it is to be a hero and change not only the city, but himself as well...

From the world of GOOD SAMARITAN, RED HOT... and THE TEAM! Flash back to earlier ages of heroes, 70s styles, Nazis... As RED HOT recuperates from a recent battle, his father - RED HOT SR. - tells him (and us) a tale of THE TEAM and a leadership crisis in the late 1970s. Then, in the back-up, discover how MISS AMAZA got her start during World War II!

FLIRTING WITH DISASTER

Sam Clarke, Ph.D., former professor, now a high school history teacher, receives a strange package in the mail, a package whose contents a flirtatious new student knows more about then she's letting on.
name: Flirting With Disaster

description:
"Can a man at the bottom sink lower?"

A story about a seedy gambler, a hitman, and a women to die for. See what lengths a man will go to get back something that was lost long ago.
Collects the first two issues of the Xiat - Cosmic Adventure Monk zine, plus a bonus story!
Chapter 1 - 8.
name: Vol. 1

description: Chapter 1 - 6.
name: Vol. 1
